google-description: Discover through our article, a street so lively day and night, Yasukuni-Dori Avenue. We tell you, from our experience, how to get there, how long to stay and where to stay. All with our travelogue and our photos.
social-network-description: All of a sudden, let there be light. Without warning, we are in the middle of Yasukuni-Dori Street, surrounded by large buildings filled with light panels, from the bottom to the top. Watch out, Godzilla is around.
